BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of an office of labor standards, and to repeal subdivision (i) of section 20-a of such charter and section 20-925 of such code, relating to the designation of an agency to enforce the Earned Sick Time Act
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Relating to the designation of an agency to enforce the Earned Sick Time Act.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of an office of labor standards, and to repeal subdivision (i) of section 20-a of such charter and section 20-925 of such code, relating to the designation of an agency to enforce the Earned Sick Time Act
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Relating to the designation of an agency to enforce the Earned Sick Time Act.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of an office of labor standards, and to repeal subdivision (i) of section 20-a of such charter and section 20-925 of such code, relating to the designation of an agency to enforce the Earned Sick Time Act
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amended by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of an office of labor standards, and to repeal subdivision (i) of section 20-a of such charter and section 20-925 of such code, relating to the designation of an agency to enforce the Earned Sick Time Act
